metadata.title: CVE-2016-3088 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The Fileserver web application in Apache ActiveMQ 5.x before 5.14.0 allowsremote attackers to upload and execute arbitrary files via an HTTP PUTfollowed by an HTTP MOVE request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3088` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

activemq - 5.14.0+dfsg-1
libactivemq-java - 5.14.0+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: activemq package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.14.0+dfsg-1').
